captions.text:
Yo~ check check attendance
Yosub check it out baby
Hyunseung is here too~ check check check!

Joonhyung is here,
my blood type is also 'Yong Joon' hyung
Beast is back with its 6th mini album
It's less than a minute for each member
Since we don't have much time, let's do it fast
Many of our fans sent messages on SNS

Kim JiHoo says Congratulations
on your 6th mini album

I grew up with Beast as from 5th grader
up until now as a high school student

She has finished the compulsory
education of Korea with us
If all six of us talk today, we're not gonna make it
so we'll pick the main DJ
What shall we do? rock-paper-scissors game?
Oh god why did I pick paper?
Okay, then I should be in the center
Do we have to change our seats?
If you do, you can get out
We'll start off with Beast's mini album's manual
This album's title song is called 'Good Luck
Do you guys have any lucky charms?

We don't have much time so if
something's not funny we should cut it off
Honestly, I'm not sure about this topic
For me, thinking about b2uty after I wake up?
The technical term for this is 'Morning B2uty'
Q. Why is the album called Good Luck?
Oh, you're aimed at the World Cup
Good luck to us, good luck to everybody
I took a part in writing the lyrics for this album

Then, you like your 'History'
better than Joonhyung's 'Good Luck'?
Oh, he's trying to come between us
Let's wrap it up by singing History

Beast's dancer Hyunseung will show
the point choreography of 'Good Luck'

The point choreography is making a "V"
with your fingers during the chorus
I think this looks very nice
We'll come back after the commercials
The only thing left for Beast is loyalty!

If you want to keep loyal to Beast,
listen to Beast's 6th mini album a lot!
Beast kept loyal with its comeback, fisnished!
It's time for Okay, Not Okay
We'll find out what we can/cannot say/do to each other
As a main DJ, I would like to hear it from JoonHyung
Hyunseung, I know you're off the wall but
Kikwang, why don't you go and wash your hair?
When my hair's not done, they get angry
This is shorter than what I thought
We only had five minutes, you should be faster
Okay, it's time to wrap up and say good bye
I will introduce the last song request

Cho Minhee says..
when I was having a hard time,
In hard times~ lean on me~
I heard 'Oasis' which was recommended by my friend

The lyrics were really similar to my story
so I could actually connect to the song

I would like to hear 'Oasis' which had been
a great support for me
Okay, we will play Beast's Oasis

title: OVEN RADIO(오븐라디오) Ep.1: BEAST(비스트) _ Good Luck(굿럭) [ENG/JPN/CHN SUB]
